summary: This document outlines the terms of reference for the Regional Reputational Risk Committee of Deutsche Bank AG, detailing its mission, responsibilities, and governance structure. It emphasizes the importance of oversight and coordination regarding reputational risks within the Americas region of the bank.
keyFacts: The Regional Reputational Risk Committee was established on January 1, 2010.
The document is confidential and contains proprietary information of Deutsche Bank Group.
The committee is responsible for oversight and governance related to reputational risks in the Americas region.
